creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Thomas L. Daniels
description: Genre. Figural Group. Over door panel. Five adult figures, two children, and one dog. From L to R: Two adult figures, male and female, facing left; one child with arm around a dog's neck; adult male in center of composition, basket raised above head; two adult figures, male and female, facing away from the viewer; child following while holding the hand/arm of the female figure.
title: Untitled
